nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.commands
This package contains command definitions and command factories used by this project, as well as various base command classes and interfaces.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers
This package contains managers that manage different certain aspects of the plugin.
